hero.readyToJoin: Ready to join your team for a 6-month end-of-study internship starting in February 2026.

testimonials.title: What people I've worked with say about me
testimonials.description: I've worked with a lot of people and I've learned a lot from them. Here are some of the things they've said about me.

first.text: “I had the opportunity to work with Mohamed for a year, and I can only highly recommend him for his future projects.<newline></newline>He is a versatile engineer, capable of handling end-to-end topics (DevOps, Frontend, Backend, etc.) while designing high-performance and scalable solutions. His attention to detail is remarkable: every deliverable is clean, optimized, and sustainable.<newline></newline>This rigor has been a valuable asset in meeting the deadlines of the projects we worked on together. I am confident that Mohamed will excel in his future missions, thanks to his skills, professionalism, and positive attitude.<newline></newline>A true asset for any team looking to move forward with confidence.”

author.name: John Doe
author.handle: Senior Software Architect @ Orange, IAD, etc.

second.text: “I had the pleasure of working with Mohamed and I can attest to his autonomy and the exceptional quality of his work.<newline></newline>He has always been very reliable and has contributed significantly during the entire collaboration period.”
